name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook mitigates an incident where a malicious script has been executed, leading to unauthorized data access and exfiltration.

start--f1e23a51-c12a-4b7f-aba0-dcc18ae12.name: Start Incident Mitigation
start--f1e23a51-c12a-4b7f-aba0-dcc18ae12.description: Initiate the mitigation process for the malicious script incident.

action--c0e2235e-d9ed-496b-b9bb-6b5012c5.name: Kill malicious process
action--c0e2235e-d9ed-496b-b9bb-6b5012c5.description: Terminate the malicious process executing on the host.

action--647d09cb-2e5b-4915-8b27-de0a3879.name: Disable outbound traffic to suspicious IP
action--647d09cb-2e5b-4915-8b27-de0a3879.description: Block outbound traffic to the identified suspicious IP address.

loop--8dcb282e-4352-4016-a6cf-647d9cb2b9.name: Run malware scan loop
loop--8dcb282e-4352-4016-a6cf-647d9cb2b9.description: Run a malware scan on the affected host and continue to scan until it is clean.

action--8dcb282e-4352-4016-a6cf-647d9cb2.name: Run malware scan on affected host
action--8dcb282e-4352-4016-a6cf-647d9cb2.description: Perform a malware scan to identify any remaining threats.

commands.command: clamscan -r /path/to/scan; if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 'scan_status=clean'; else echo 'scan_status=dirty'; fi
